posts.content: Has anybody managed to find a source for new Formica as close as possible to the black Formica top on the Devon units and then the white inner Formica circa 66/67? Cheers Kevin

I'm pretty sure I found some of the white inner stuff, £150 for 8x4 sheet, I left it.
But if you want to go halves id be interested

I know bobley did and there is another forum poster who did who kindly let me have some for my Devon Transverse cot brackets...
I will PM him..
Cheers guys, any info on this would be appreciated. I see your in bristol jayvanman, I'm up in Cheshire, so logistics might be a pain, but I'm interested if it's workable!

Hi, I would be happy to chip in as well if it helps.

Jim

Kevin, I purchased a sheet of Jet Black Shell F6468 formica from IDS Surfaces some time ago and in my opinion its a good match. I could send you an offcut if you like.
I'm also after a piece of the inner formica Grey muslin F8261 to replace the inside of my cooker unit (Devon 64 bus).

Steve

Wouldn't mind some myself black and the grey
Live in Worcester which is a bit closer to Cheshire if that helps
Mark

sheedy wrote:Kevin, I purchased a sheet of Jet Black Shell F6468 formica from IDS Surfaces some time ago and in my opinion its a good match. I could send you an offcut if you like.
I'm also after a piece of the inner formica Grey muslin F8261 to replace the inside of my cooker unit (Devon 64 bus).

Steve


Hi Steve if you could send an off cut that would be appreciated cheers Kevin

K Hicks
Towers Cottage
Towers Road
Poynton
Cheshire
SK12 1DE
Is it possible to still buy that grey you mention? I couldn't find it on the IDS website.

I've just found that Formica do a "younique" service where you give them an Image and they print and bond it to make your own laminate, is being just too anal!?...plus it costs about £70 per square metre in single sheets so not cheap. It comes down in price when you order multiple sheets.... I've not yet found the price for a standard laminate, but I'm guessing it's no where near as expensive.

Hi Kevin,
I'll pop some of the black in the post to you.
As for the grey muslin I believe it was discontinued a few years back.
I would definitely be up for commissioning a reprint unless there's a Devon owner with some spare.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Ok I spoke to someone today and sent over this picture (probably should have cleaned the dust off first!) they're going to see if they have something similar and if not was going to clarify price to make it. I guess we have the same patterned white? I believe Devon were good at using whatever was to hand!

sheedy wrote:Kevin, I purchased a sheet of Jet Black Shell F6468 formica from IDS Surfaces some time ago and in my opinion its a good match. I could send you an offcut if you like.
I'm also after a piece of the inner formica Grey muslin F8261 to replace the inside of my cooker unit (Devon 64 bus).

Steve


Did you just go into your local IDS branch to get it? I have one locally, and will probably need some. How much did you pay

Ordered it online, from memory for a 8x4 ft sheet it was around the £80 mark.
The postage was about £30 tho!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Ordered it online, from memory for a 8x4 ft sheet it was around the £80 mark.
The postage was about £30 tho!
